title: Phase 2: UI + Wizard
description: Implement landing page, wizard intake flow, component library setup with Next.js 14+, Tailwind, shadcn/ui.

title: Scaffold Next.js 14+ Project
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Initialize Next.js 14+ with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui. Set up:
- Project structure per architecture doc
- Tailwind config with BillShield color palette (white, navy, gray)
- shadcn/ui component installation
- Prisma init
- ESLint + Prettier config
- Environment variable structure (.env.example)
- Base layout with responsive container
- Font setup (clean sans-serif)
Output: Complete scaffolded Next.js project ready for feature development

title: Implement Landing Page
description:
Build the landing page per UX spec and copy docs:
- Hero section with value prop + CTA
- How it works (3 steps visual)
- Social proof section (placeholders)
- FAQ accordion
- Pricing cards (Basic $49 / Premium $99)
- Footer with legal links
- Mobile responsive
- Disclaimers in footer
- SEO metadata
Output: app/page.tsx + components

title: Implement Wizard Intake Flow
description:
Build multi-step wizard at /wizard:
- Progress indicator (step X of Y)
- Steps: Bill Info -> Insurance Status -> Financial Status -> Urgency
- Bill Info: amount, provider, state, visit type, date, in-network, itemized bill, EOB, collections, prior payment
- Insurance: insured/uninsured, deductible met, denied claim, surprise bill
- Financial: income bracket, household size, employment, hardship indicators, ability to pay
- Urgency: due date, collections threats, payment plan offered
- 'I don't know' option on applicable fields
- Validation per step
- Calming microcopy and tooltips
- State management (React state or URL params)
- Mobile-first responsive
Output: app/wizard/ route group + wizard components

title: Implement Legal Pages
description:
Build legal/static pages:
- /terms - Terms of Service
- /privacy - Privacy Policy
- /disclaimer - Disclaimers (not legal advice, not medical advice, etc.)
- /faq - FAQ page with accordion
- /pricing - Pricing page with tier comparison
- All based on compliance doc templates
- Consistent layout with site nav/footer
Output: app/terms/ + app/privacy/ + app/disclaimer/ + app/faq/ + app/pricing/ pages

title: bi-494.1 COMPLETED - SEO pages pushed
description: Implemented all 5 SEO guide pages under src/app/(public)/guides/. Branch polecat/furiosa-mlb6ltl6 pushed to origin. gt done failing with known rig detection bug. Pages: how-to-negotiate-hospital-bill, charity-care-income-limits, how-to-ask-for-itemized-bill, medical-bill-went-to-collections, surprise-out-of-network-bill-help. Each has metadata exports and CTA to /start.

title: bi-6u1.2 COMPLETED

title: UPDATE: 6/7 Phase 1 polecats produced output - all stuck on gt done
description:
Follow-up to worktree escalation.

6 of 7 Phase 1 polecats have produced deliverables (all untracked files):
- furiosa: prd.md (477 lines) - CLOSED
- slit: schema.md + schema.prisma (377 lines) - CLOSED  
- nux: architecture.md (710 lines) - CLOSED
- capable: rules-engine.md (672 lines) - CLOSED
- toast: copy.md (457 lines) - gt done failing, bead still open
- dementus: compliance.md (370 lines) - still working
- rictus: no output yet - still working

3 polecats have mailed me about gt done failing (furiosa, slit, toast).
All report same error: "rig polecats not found" - gt parses CWD path wrong.

No branches pushed to remote. All work is untracked files in worktree dirs.
Work is safe for now but CANNOT enter merge queue until recovered.

Recommend: Manual recovery of completed files into proper branches.

title: Phase 8: QA + Launch Readiness
description: Test all flows, mobile responsiveness, performance optimization, SEO audit, final QA pass.

title: Implement SEO Pages
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

5 SEO-optimized content pages targeting:
1. 'how to negotiate hospital bill'
2. 'charity care income limits'
3. 'how to ask for itemized bill'
4. 'medical bill went to collections'
5. 'surprise out of network bill help'
Each page: clean metadata, structured content, internal CTAs to wizard, fast loading
Output: app/(seo)/ route group with 5 pages

title: QA: Full Flow Testing + Mobile + Performance
description:
Final QA:
- End-to-end flow test: landing -> wizard -> results -> checkout -> success -> download
- Mobile responsiveness on all pages
- Performance optimization (Lighthouse targets: 90+ scores)
- Cross-browser testing
- Accessibility basics (ARIA, contrast, keyboard nav)
- Error state handling
- Edge case testing in wizard
Output: All issues resolved, production-ready

It appears gt is parsing the CWD path polecats/toast/billshield and treating polecats as a rig name. Work is done and pushed - need help getting it into the merge queue.

title: Phase 4: Payments + PDF
description: Stripe integration, paywall logic, PDF generation for action plans + letters + scripts.

title: Implement Stripe Payment + Checkout
description:
Stripe integration:
- Stripe Checkout session creation (server-side)
- Two tiers: Basic $49, Premium $99
- /checkout page with tier selection + Stripe redirect
- /success page with payment confirmation
- Webhook handler for payment confirmation
- Payment record in database
- Unlock full plan after successful payment
- Error handling for failed payments
Output: app/checkout/ + app/success/ + app/api/stripe/ routes

title: Implement PDF Generation
description:
PDF generation system:
- Generate comprehensive PDF containing: action plan, checklist, all selected letters, phone/email scripts
- Professional layout matching brand (navy, white, clean)
- Server-side generation (React PDF or puppeteer)
- Download endpoint /api/download-pdf
- Only accessible after payment verified
- Include disclaimer footer on every page
Output: lib/pdf-generator.ts + app/api/download-pdf/ route

title: Phase 5: Auth + Persistence
description: Optional user login via magic link, case save/load, database integration with Prisma + Postgres.

title: Implement Auth System
description:
Authentication:
- Auth.js (NextAuth) with email magic link provider
- Guest mode: no login required, generate plan without account
- Optional login: save case to account
- Session management
- Protected routes (admin, dashboard)
Output: app/api/auth/ + auth config + middleware

title: Implement Case Persistence + Dashboard
description:
Case save/load:
- Save case (intake data + generated plan) to database
- Guest case: stored with session token, convertible to account
- User dashboard at /dashboard: list saved cases, view/download plans
- Prisma database operations
Output: app/dashboard/ + lib/case-service.ts

title: bi-1ko.4 COMPLETED
description: Implemented all 5 legal/static pages: /terms (full ToS from compliance template), /privacy (full privacy policy), /disclaimer (all 8 disclaimer sections), /faq (11 questions in accordion groups), /pricing (tier comparison cards with trust signals and FAQ). Installed shadcn accordion component. Build passes clean. Branch pushed. gt done failed with 'rig polecats not found' — closed bead directly.

title: gt done: rig detection fails in polecat worktree (reads 'polecats' from path)
Phase 3: Engine + Output
description: Implement rules engine, action plan generator, letter templates, script templates. Deterministic output based on user inputs.

title: Implement Rules Engine + Action Plan Generator
description:
Build the deterministic rules engine per rules-engine spec:
- Input: structured intake data from wizard
- Decision tree evaluating all pathways
- Output structured action plan:
  * Next 24 hours actions
  * Next 7 days actions
  * If they refuse actions
  * What NOT to do
  * Negotiation leverage points
  * Recommended ask amounts (30-60% discount ranges)
  * Phone scripts
  * Email scripts
  * Documentation to gather
  * Debt collector warnings
  * Timeline checklist
- Letter selection based on situation
- Priority ordering
- 'Do not pay yet' warning logic
Output: lib/rules-engine.ts + lib/plan-generator.ts

title: Implement Letter Templates + Generator
description:
Build letter template system:
- Templates: itemized bill request, charity care/financial assistance, hardship discount, prompt pay discount, dispute charges/coding review, income-based payment plan, insurance appeal starter, debt validation
- Each template: professional format, fill-in variables from intake data, editable in UI
- Letter preview component
- Letter editing UI (rich text or markdown)
- Export-ready format for PDF
Output: lib/letters/ + components/LetterPreview + letter template data

title: Implement Results Page
description:
Build /results page showing generated plan:
- Action plan sections with timeline
- Letter previews (editable)
- Phone/email scripts
- Checklist component
- Preview mode: show partial plan (first 24hr actions visible, rest blurred/locked)
- Full mode: all content visible after payment
- Download PDF button (locked behind paywall)
- Clean, scannable layout
- Print-friendly styling
Output: app/results/page.tsx + result components

title: Phase 6: Admin Dashboard
description: Protected admin route with usage metrics, anonymized intake stats, pricing management, letter template management.

title: Implement Admin Dashboard
description:
Admin panel at /admin (protected):
- Usage metrics: cases created, payments processed, conversion rate
- Anonymized intake stats: common bill types, avg amounts, insurance status distribution
- Pricing management: update tier prices
- Letter template management: edit/add/deactivate templates
- Simple table/card layout
Output: app/admin/ pages + admin API routes

title: BillShield MVP Convoy
description: Full MVP build: 8 phases from discovery to launch

Auth system implementation is complete and pushed to polecat/slit-mlb5ywvu. Build passes. gt done fails with known rig detection bug. Please process manually.

Files changed:

title: ESCALATION: Polecat worktree infrastructure broken - all on main, no feature branches
description:
CRITICAL: All 7 polecat worktrees in billshield are misconfigured.

SYMPTOMS:
- All polecats are on `main` branch (no feature branches created)
- Worktrees point to monorepo root, not billshield subtree
- Files written to nested path: polecats/<name>/billshield/docs/
- `gt done` fails with "rig polecats not found" (reported by furiosa + slit)
- No commits possible — work is untracked files only

COMPLETED WORK AT RISK (untracked files, not committed):
- furiosa: billshield/docs/prd.md (477 lines) — bi-y8h.1 closed
- slit: billshield/docs/schema.md + prisma/schema.prisma (377 lines) — bi-y8h.3 closed

ACTIVE SESSIONS STILL RUNNING:
- capable (bi-y8h.6), dementus (bi-y8h.5), nux (bi-y8h.2), rictus (bi-y8h.4)
- dag (newly dispatched)
- furiosa session still alive but work is done

RECOMMENDED:
1. Halt new polecat dispatches until worktree setup is fixed
2. Recover furiosa + slit output before nuking worktrees
3. Fix worktree creation to use feature branches

title: gt done fails: rig 'polecats' not found - branch name parsing issue
Phase 1: Discovery + Specification
description: Write full PRD, technical architecture, database schema, UX spec, compliance plan. All spec docs must be complete before code begins.

title: Write Product Requirements Document (PRD)
description:
Complete PRD covering:
- MVP feature list with acceptance criteria
- User flows (guest + authenticated)
- Pricing strategy ($49 basic / $99 premium)
- Customer journey from landing to download
- Feature prioritization matrix
- Non-MVP feature roadmap
- Business model details (Stripe flat-fee, future affiliate/subscription)
Output: docs/prd.md

title: Write Technical Architecture Document
description:
Complete tech architecture covering:
- Next.js 14+ App Router structure
- TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui setup
- Prisma ORM + Postgres (Supabase/Neon)
- Auth.js or Clerk for authentication
- Stripe payment flow
- PDF generation approach
- API route design
- App route map (/, /start, /wizard, /results, /checkout, /success, /login, /dashboard, /admin, /terms, /privacy, /disclaimer, /faq, /pricing)
- Folder structure
- Environment variables spec
- Vercel deployment config
Output: docs/architecture.md

title: Design Database Schema
description:
Design complete Prisma schema for:
- Users (id, email, createdAt, optional profile)
- Cases (id, userId nullable for guests, intakeData JSON, status, createdAt)
- Payments (id, caseId, stripeSessionId, amount, tier, status, createdAt)
- GeneratedPlans (id, caseId, planData JSON, tier, createdAt)
- LetterTemplates (id, type, title, body template, variables, active)
- AdminSettings (id, key, value, updatedAt)
Minimize sensitive fields. Guest mode = nullable userId.
Output: docs/schema.md + prisma/schema.prisma draft

title: Design UX/UI Specification
description:
Complete UX spec covering:
- Page-by-page layout wireframes (text-based)
- Wizard flow: step sequence, fields per step, validation, progress indicator
- Color palette: white bg, navy blue accents, soft gray borders, subtle shadows, rounded corners
- Typography: clean sans-serif, hierarchy
- Component inventory (shadcn/ui components needed)
- Mobile-first responsive breakpoints
- Trust signals placement
- Disclaimer positioning
- Microcopy guidelines (calming, supportive, 7-9th grade reading level)
- Inspiration: Stripe, Linear, Ramp, Notion, TurboTax
Output: docs/ux-spec.md

title: Write Compliance & Legal Plan
description:
Compliance plan covering:
- HIPAA applicability analysis (we are NOT a covered entity)
- Required disclaimers (not legal advice, not medical advice, not affiliated, no guarantees)
- Privacy Policy template
- Terms of Service template
- Disclaimer page content
- Data minimization strategy
- Guest mode privacy implications
- Stripe PCI compliance (handled by Stripe)
- State-by-state considerations for future
Output: docs/compliance.md + templates for /terms, /privacy, /disclaimer pages

title: Design Rules Engine Specification
description:
Spec the deterministic rules engine:
- Input variables: hospital type (nonprofit/for-profit), insurance status, income bracket, household size, bill amount, collections status, state, visit type, itemized bill status, EOB status, denied claim, surprise billing, urgency
- Decision tree logic for each pathway:
  * Charity care eligibility (nonprofit + low income + uninsured)
  * Insurance appeal (insured + denied claim)
  * Itemized bill request (no itemized bill yet)
  * Debt validation (collections)
  * Hardship + negotiation (large bill + uninsured)
  * Settlement offers (can pay partial)
  * Prompt pay discount
  * Coding error detection suggestions
- Output structure: action plan sections, letter selection, script selection, timeline
- Priority ordering of actions
- 'Do not pay yet' warning conditions
Output: docs/rules-engine.md

title: Write Landing Page + Marketing Copy
description:
Write all copy for:
- Landing page: hero, value prop, how it works (3 steps), social proof placeholders, FAQ (8-10 questions), pricing section, CTA copy, footer
- Wizard microcopy: step titles, field labels, tooltips, reassurance copy, 'I don't know' option text
- Results page: section headers, preview vs locked content messaging
- Payment page: pricing tier descriptions, trust signals
- Brand voice: calm, supportive, confident, no judgment, practical, 7-9th grade reading level
- SEO page titles/descriptions for 5 target pages
Output: docs/copy.md

title: Write Marketing Launch Plan
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Marketing strategy covering:
- SEO strategy: 5 target keywords, page structure, metadata
- Content marketing plan: blog topics, social posts
- Reddit strategy: relevant subreddits, post templates
- TikTok/social strategy: content angles
- Launch sequence: pre-launch, launch day, post-launch
- Pricing validation plan
- User acquisition channels
Output: docs/marketing-plan.md
